displayName.text: Center for Weight Loss Surgery at Columbia University

formattedAddress: 161 Fort Washington Ave #524, New York, NY 10032, USA
adrFormatAddress: 161 Fort Washington Ave #524, New York, NY 10032, USA

originalText.text: Dr. Bessler is a down to earth surgeon and very experienced, which I certainly appreciated.  Gio is equally awesome and really supportive.  While the office staff is responsive, their demeanor can be hard to take at times (dismissive, short) which made it a challenge to be a patient of the center.  I hope management has worked with the staff on this issue (I am a former patient from 2019), seeing how communications happen much more with office staff than it does with the surgeon who you only see and speak to occasionally.

text.text: Dr. Bessler is a down to earth surgeon and very experienced, which I certainly appreciated.  Gio is equally awesome and really supportive.  While the office staff is responsive, their demeanor can be hard to take at times (dismissive, short) which made it a challenge to be a patient of the center.  I hope management has worked with the staff on this issue (I am a former patient from 2019), seeing how communications happen much more with office staff than it does with the surgeon who you only see and speak to occasionally.

originalText.text:
Dr Abraham Krikhely Has excellent bedside manner is very informative, he makes a very very stressful process easier. I had minimal to no scarring after my treatment, thanks to him and his teams skilled hands. Ms Skolnicks groups were energetic,supportive and informational. Erica on the administrative team was patient with me and would explain my paper work  thoroughly, and the nurse team after my surgery especially nurse Greta who stayed pass her work time to insure I was cared for and Nurse Stephens she insured I received my medication on site at my room and I was discharged efficiently and safely. And many others pre & post  operatively I found to be kind , patient ,and professional throughout my on going care at Columbia Biriatric Weight Loss Surgery Center.

Thank you all ðŸ™‚

originalText.text: 2014 I presented Dr Bessler will one of the crazy cases you could imagine I asked him to reverse my gastric bypass surgery I had in 2009 that I went from 426 to about 175. Then return Dr Bessler and Gio I had sleeve in 2017 at 386 now back down to 190 thanks for excellent care and bed side manner it goes along way.
